name: setFieldConfigurationSchemeMapping
description:
Assigns issue types to field configurations on field configuration scheme.

This operation can only modify field configuration schemes used in company-managed (classic) projects.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

id.description: The ID of the field configuration scheme.

AssociateFieldConfigurationsWithIssueTyp.description: Details of a field configuration to issue type mappings.

mappings.description: Field configuration to issue type mappings.

FieldConfigurationToIssueTypeMapping.description: The field configuration to issue type mapping.

fieldConfigurationId.description: The ID of the field configuration.

issueTypeId.description: The ID of the issue type or *default*. When set to *default* this field configuration issue type item applies to all issue types without a field configuration. An issue type can be included only once in a request.
